full_summary:
**Pre-authorized Debit (PAD) Services Requirement**
==============================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (DPWGS) is seeking a formal arrangement with a single service provider for the processing of all Pre-Authorized Debit (PAD) transactions on behalf of the Receiver General for Canada.

### Notice Details

*   **Tender Reference Number:** WS4223553681
*   **Tender Title:** Pre-Authorized Debits (PAD)
*   **Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)
*   **Security Clearances:** Required

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01
*   **Contract End Date:** None
*   **Contract Period:** Up to 5 years with option to extend for 1 year and 8 months

### Submission Requirements

*   **Submission Deadline:** 2023-11-06T14:00:00 EST
*   **Late Submissions:** Bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive

### Key Requirements

*   **Service Provider:** Services to be provided nationwide on behalf of Canada
*   **Supporting Documentation:** All required documentation must be submitted with the bid
*   **Security Requirements:** Associated with this requirement

### Tender Information

*   **Tender Notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17528537?extsite=MTc1Mjg1MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Erin Schulz
    *   Email: [erin.schulz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.schulz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Important Dates

*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-06T14:00:00 EST
*   **Modification Date:** 2023-11-03
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-09-22

Please note that all modifications to the tender notice will be posted on the GNAM public bid webpage. You can sign up for notifications regarding this opportunity on the Canada.ca website.
